overview: Collection of two short films from Nova. "Dormitory Daze" — Hot jock Joe and big man on campus Andy get down to some heavy bedroom socializing.  Later downstairs, they find studious Jerry who quickly becomes the happy victim of their sex-hungry drives. "The Invitation" — Steve's folks have installed a new hot tub and the hunky stud can't wait to invite his always horny friends over to break it in properly.
title: Dormitory Daze/The Invitation
